metadata.title: CVE-2024-24685 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple stack-based buffer overflow vulnerabilities exist in the readOFFfunctionality of libigl v2.5.0. A specially crafted .off file can lead tostack-based buffer overflow. An attacker can provide a malicious file totrigger this vulnerability.This vulnerability concerns the parsing ofcomments within the vertex section of an `.off` file processed via the`readOFF` function.

criterions.comment: slic3r-prusa package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
